name: inviZimals: Shadow Zone
description:
Compatible with PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) and PlayStation®Vita systems.

The Invizimals are back! Embark on an adventure across the planet, studying legendary beasts from myth and lore on a quest to learn the secrets of the Invizimals’ origins.
Invizimals are hiding in the real world around you right now – in your bedroom, in the kitchen, even outside – and once you’ve tracked them down you will need to use all kinds of ingenious techniques to catch them.
Start hunting for Invizimals in the shadows today.

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated portable systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
